title: CYBER_COWBOY
author: CYBER_COWBOY
content: Using PayPal Goods and Services while buying and selling btc.You guys think this is a good or bad idea?I have a PayPal account that only can receive and send as Goods and services. Is it impossible or is is possible to buy & sell bitcoin. mostly sell bitcoin whit Goods and services?What is the risk I take?Is it easy for people to charge back money if i have proof that I sold them bitcoin?Just want to know as much as possible about this, please share your toughts

comments.author: LoyceV
comments.body: Quote from: CYBER_COWBOY on February 25, 2023, 01:46:41 PMYou guys think this is a good or bad idea?Bad idea.QuoteI have a PayPal account that only can receive and send as Goods and services.It's simple: don't use it for anything that isn't allowed.QuoteWhat is the risk I take?You risk losing your money and getting your Paypal account frozen.QuoteIs it easy for people to charge back money if i have proof that I sold them bitcoin?Yes. Scammers will use hacked accounts to pay you.QuoteJust want to know as much as possible about this, please share your toughts Don't do it.
